review: After I installed Amazon Fire I tried it for about 3 hours.  When my phone + wifi connection bill arrived it was astronomical.  My son in law, in the computer industry, explained to me that in a city he pays for the internet speed.  As a rural customer using satalite or wifi I pay for the giga bytes hence my outrangeous bill.  It is not cost-effective for me to use the devise and I would recommend anyone living in a rural area to think twice about its purchase.  The specifications, etc. fail to address non city use.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Never could get it to work.  Connected to my Wi-Fi ok, but would stop loading & I could not watch anything.  Called customer support & they stepped me thru various "fixes", all to no avail.  CS said they would "kick" it up the ladder & someone would call me next day.  Didn't happen.  I called them.  Same "fixes", still didn't work.  I purchased a Cat 5 Ethernet cable and "hard wired" the unit, thinking maybe the Wi-Fi was the problem.  Still wouldn't work.  Contacted CS again....stepped thru same "fixes" as before (unplug, re-set router, etc.).  Still not working.  CS said they will call me back by 3:00pm next day.  I even received an e-mail confirming the call back.  Guess what...no call.  I  called them & asked for a return after explaining the problem.  They said OK and the usual canned responses.  Amazon issued a call tag & it was picked up the next day.  But there's more!  Now they want to charge me for returning it by shorting my credit!  Yes that's right folks, it doesn't work but I'm being charged to return it to them.  What a joke!  Don't think I'll be doing any more business with Amazon this Holiday Season!
